items.name: Barrowblaster
items.description: A robust ale, streaked black and white, with a rich, iron-like flavour. Effect: Belching and goggling.

items.name: Keye's Balm
items.description: A golden ale that tastes of honey and hops. Effect: Causes good-natured slumping.

items.name: Marrowhyte Dark
items.description: A thick stout as black as midnight on a moonless night. Tastes of smoky bacon. Effect: Brings on a woozy empathy.

items.name: Pilston's Heartbreaker
items.description: A milky white ale that tastes of singed elderberries. Effect: Causes a delirious state of cackling and misdirected aggression.

consumption_effect.description: Causes delirious cackling and misdirected aggression

items.name: Bard's Cordial
items.description: A frothy, orange spirit that tastes of malted rye. Effect: Brings on a state of unexpected poetry.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on a state of unexpected poetry

items.name: Old Swythener
items.description: A colourless spirit, tasting of charred beech and honey. Effect: Brings on a state of rampant disorientation.

items.name: Prigwort Tipple
items.description: A recent export from the cheaper distilleries of Prigwort. An electric blue spirit that tastes of chestnut and fennel. Effect: Inspires giddy hijinks.

items.name: Mason's
items.description: Finely shredded, chestnut brown leaves, commonly drunk with milk. Favoured by the working classes. Effect: Highly invigorating.

items.name: Cobsworth Pale
items.description: A fine, fizzing ale with a yellow hue and the flavour of cherry syrup. Effect: Indulging brings on a propensity for pointed philosophical debate.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on propensity for pointed philosophical debate

items.name: Halthwidden's
items.description: A gloopy, grey ale that tastes of plum and cinnamon. Effect: Provokes indiscriminate romantic advances.

items.name: Merryweather
items.description: A crisp, pale green, sparkling cider with a hint of butterscotch. Effect: Grinning and redness of face.

items.name: Tithelands Cider
items.description: Sharp, amber, slightly sour. Leaves a tingling sensation on the palate. Effect: Tranquil daydreaming. A few drops in a poultice cures pimples, wearing a sock soaked in it relieves melancholy.

consumption_effect.description: Tranquil daydreaming; poultice cures pimples; soaked sock relieves melancholy

items.name: Glubwob
items.description: A stinking grey-green slop of aged lichen and yeast froth. A commonplace mossling beverage. Tastes of rank ditch water. Effect: Induces light-hearted tomfoolery and cathartic vomiting.

consumption_effect.description: Induces light-hearted tomfoolery and cathartic vomiting

items.name: Mead
items.description: A sweet, syrupy wine made from fermented honey. Especially beloved by woodgrues. Effect: Induces a cosy feeling in the belly and a light, eloquent state of mind.

consumption_effect.description: Induces cosy belly feeling and light, eloquent state of mind

items.name: Distillation of Dusk
items.description: A rare, ultraviolet spirit with a lingering, oaken after-taste. Effect: Brings on a delightful state of listless lounging.

items.name: Ether of Blue
items.description: A spirit with a delicate, translucent aqua hue and a flavour akin to custard with a hint of skunk. Effect: Inspires a state of lucid sensuality.

consumption_effect.description: Inspires a state of lucid sensuality

items.name: Pokey Nog
items.description: A fermented custard, egg-yolk yellow in hue and with a delightful, creamy flavour. Effect: Brings on a state of rambunctious speaking in tongues.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on rambunctious speaking in tongues

items.name: Porrid's Full Moon
items.description: A spirit of profound indigo hue that tastes of blackcurrant. Effect: Causes cathartic bellowing and screeching.

items.name: The Night Liqueur
items.description: A spirit of violent, greenish-purple hue. Tasteless but highly astringent. Effect: Brings about a soporific languor.

items.name: Wakelyke's Scarlet
items.description: A deep red spirit with a wince-inducing, acrid flavour. Effect: Causes gagging and shouting.

items.name: Earl Yellow
items.description: Dark leaves with flecks of scintillating gold. Mild, aromatic bouquet. Effect: Calms the mind.

items.name: Buckston Fizz
items.description: A clear, sparkling wine that tastes of bitter herbs. Effect: Brings on dreamlike visions.

items.name: Faggley's Iced
items.description: An ice wine imported from the far eastern reaches of the Duchy. Tastes of elderflower and spring bouquets. Effect: Inspires a drowsiness punctuated with serene visions of snowdrifts.

consumption_effect.description: Inspires drowsiness with serene visions of snowdrifts

items.name: Inkling Wine
items.description: A rich, full-bodied red wine that tastes of syrup, over-ripe plums, and hawberries. Effect: Rankles the spirit, provoking a belligerent and arrogant mood.

consumption_effect.description: Rankles spirit, provoking belligerent and arrogant mood

items.name: Moon's Milk
items.description: Exported from the mossling village of Orbswallow. A sweet and awfully sour fermented mix of milky and fruity liquids. Effect: Inspires jovial banter.
items.taste: Sweet and awfully sour; milky and fruity

items.name: Nippers
items.description: A distillation of fermented catnip which is a common vice among grimalkins. Insipid stuff for non-grimalkins. Effect: Drives cat-folk wild and raucous.

items.name: Lord Oberon's Ambrosial
items.description: Prigwort's finest distillation. An insipid brown spirit tasting of sour rosehips. Effect: Imbibers slip into a blissful reverie.

items.name: Prigwort Pure
items.description: A rich, emerald green spirit with a flavour alike to woody salmon. Effect: Causes a state of eloquent camaraderie.

consumption_effect.description: Causes a state of eloquent camaraderie

items.name: Purple Aspintheon
items.description: A spirit of the utmost refinement. Pale mauve in colour, tasting of bitter liquorice. Effect: Brings on a clear-headed state in which the drinker feels immortal.

consumption_effect.description: Brings on clear-headed state; drinker feels immortal

items.name: Tomfoy's
items.description: A pale-leafed, smoky tea flavoured with aniseed and wormwood. Favoured by intellectuals. Effect: Clear-minded focus.

items.name: Lady Mauve
items.description: A delicate, violet wine imported from Fairy. Tastes of plum and charred lavender. Effect: Causes one's sorrows to drift away.

items.name: The Cold Prince
items.description: A colourless, bubbling wine always served on ice. The wine is said to contain fairy grapes but is not itself produced in the immortal world of Fairy. Tastes like pear and honey. Effect: Inspires the imbiber to feats of romantic daring.

items.name: Underbrood's Vintage
items.description: A gourmet red wine from the legendary, deceased vintner Wayfellow Underbrood. In dwindling supply and priced accordingly, the master's final fermentation is famed for exquisitely robust flavour, with undertones of lemon zest and mead. Effect: Overindulgence causes an embarrassingly rapid dissolution of muscle control.
items.taste: Exquisitely robust; undertones of lemon zest and mead

consumption_effect.description: Overindulgence causes embarrassingly rapid dissolution of muscle control

_metadata.extraction_note: Updated with consumption_effect, smell, taste fields
